https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/pLpC1cfQmD1Kbymzn96AbFTjTab.jpg A record of a few months of struggle on the set, showing an atmosphere of work and a picture of immense film machinery, and at same time presenting the truest and intimate portrait of the Master of Polish Cinema, the Oscar winner. ANDRZEJ WAJDA: Róbmy zdjęcie!
